subject: LAST Call for Papers- USA (July 15-17, 2015)
body:
Apologies if you receive multiple copies of this CFP.


Please feel free to distribute the CFP to your colleagues, students and networks.

==============================================================

The Global Technology Management Conference (GTMC2015)

http://sdiwc.net/conferences/gtmc2015/ 

Bemidji State University, Minnesota, USA 

July 15  July 17, 2015

All registered papers will be included in SDIWC Digital Library.


==============================================================
The conference aims to enable researchers build connections between different digital applications.


RESEARCH TOPICS ARE NOT LIMITED TO:


*** Information and Data Management

*** Information Content Security

*** The Management of IT Investments
	
*** Computational Intelligence

*** Biometrics Technologies
	
*** Computer Forensics

*** Computer Security

*** Data Mining

*** Wireless Communications
	
*** E- commerce Business Models

*** E- Learning

*** E- Government

*** E- Business Applications and Software

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
IMPORTANT DATES:

Submission Deadline: June 25, 2015
Notification of Acceptance: 1 week from the submission date
Camera Ready Submission: Open from now until  July 05, 2015
Registration Deadline: July 05, 2015
Conference Dates: July 15 - 17, 2015



----------------------------------------

If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=24d0ffc560e75f5ae14cc91d5b20db70
